Title: No Place Like Home
Plot: Little Nutbrown Hare wakes early one summer morning before the sun has risen. Big Nutbrown Hare sends Little Nutbrown Hare off to invite his friends for breakfast so that he can rest a little longer. Along the way, Little Nutbrown Hare discovers how wonderful and different all his friends' homes are.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
